casebody.data:
Vincent E. Ferretti, Appellant, v. Henry Ettinger et al., Defendants, and Reuben E. Gross et al., Respondents. Argued January 22, 1964; decided February 20, 1964. *497James J. Cally and Eugene V. P. Ferretti for appellant.

No appearance for respondents.

Order affirmed, without costs; no opinion.

Concur: Chief Judge Desmond and Judges Dye, Fold, Van Voorhis, Burke, Scileppi and Bergan.
